question: Who is an Introvert?
solution:
Introvert

Introvert = A shy, reserved, and inward-focused person.

Hindi Meaning: अंतर्मुखी व्यक्ति

Root Words: intro (within) + vertere (to turn)

question: What does Invincible mean?
solution:
Invincible

Invincible = Too powerful to be defeated.

Hindi Meaning: जिस पर विजय प्राप्त नहीं की जा सकती

Root Words: Lat. in- = not + vincere = to conquer

question: What does Jovial mean?
solution:
Jovial

Jovial = Cheerful and friendly.

Hindi Meaning: खुशमिजाज़, मिलनसार, हार्दिक और अच्छे स्वभाव वाले

Root Words: Lat. Jovialis = of Jupiter, cheerful

question: Who is Lazy?
solution:
Lazy

Lazy = Unwilling to work or use energy.

Hindi Meaning: काम करने या ऊर्जा का उपयोग करने में अनिच्छा

Root Words: OE lesu = feeble

question: What does Linger mean?
solution:
Linger

Linger = Remain longer than necessary.

Hindi Meaning: आवश्यकता से अधिक समय तक रुकना

Root Words: OE lengan = to delay

question: What is Malevolence?
solution:
Malevolence

Malevolence = The desire to harm others.

Hindi Meaning: हानि या बुराई पहुँचाने या करने की इच्छा

Root Words: Lat. male = ill + velle = to wish

question: What does Mediocre mean?
solution:
Mediocre

Mediocre = Only moderate or average in quality.

Hindi Meaning: केवल औसत स्तर का

Root Words: Lat. mediocris = average

question: What does Meticulous mean?
solution:
Meticulous

Meticulous = Extremely careful and precise.

Hindi Meaning: हर विवरण पर सावधानीपूर्वक ध्यान देना

Root Words: Lat. meticulosus = fearful → overly careful

question: What does Mimic mean?
solution:
Mimic

Mimic = To copy someone’s behavior or speech.

Hindi Meaning: मनोरंजन या उपहास करने के लिए किसी के कार्य या शब्दों की नकल करना

Root Words: Gr. mimos = imitator

question: What does Naive mean?
solution:
Naive

Naive = Lacking experience or judgment.

Hindi Meaning: अनुभव, बुद्धि या निर्णय की कमी दर्शाना

Root Words: Fr. naïf = natural, innocent

question: What does Nasty mean?
solution:
Nasty

Nasty = Very bad, unpleasant, or mean.

Hindi Meaning: एक अत्यंत अप्रिय, कष्टप्रद, आपत्तिजनक ध्वनि

Root Words: ME nasti = dirty

question: Who is a Nonentity?
solution:
Nonentity

Nonentity = Someone unimportant or insignificant.

Hindi Meaning: एक महत्वहीन व्यक्ति

Root Words: Lat. non = not + entitas = being

question: What does Opinionated mean?
solution:
Opinionated

Opinionated = Unwilling to change one’s own opinions.

Hindi Meaning: अपने विचारों में हठधर्मी होना

Root Words: opinion + -ated = having strong views

question: Who is a Pedant?
solution:
Pedant

Pedant = One who is excessively concerned with minor details.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जो औपचारिक नियमों या साहित्यिक अर्थ के पालन पर जोर देता है

Root Words: It. pedante = teacher → overemphasizer of rules

question: What does Pedantic mean?
solution:
Pedantic

Pedantic = Overemphasizing rules or details.

Hindi Meaning: एक शैली जिसमें एक लेखक अपने ज्ञान का प्रदर्शन करता है

Root Words: From pedant = overly academic

question: Who is a Perfectionist?
solution:
Perfectionist

Perfectionist = One who seeks perfection in everything.

Hindi Meaning: पूर्णतावादी व्यक्ति

Root Words: perfectus (Latin: complete) + ist

question: What is Perseverance?
solution:
Perseverance

Perseverance = Continued effort despite difficulty.

Hindi Meaning: कुछ हासिल करने के लिए निरंतर प्रयास

Root Words: Lat. perseverantia = persistence

question: What does Pliable mean?
solution:
Pliable

Pliable = Flexible and easily influenced.

Hindi Meaning: बिना टूटे आसानी से झुकने में सक्षम

Root Words: Lat. plicare = to bend

question: What is Pride?
solution:
Pride

Pride = A sense of self-respect and personal worth.

Hindi Meaning: शेरों का एक समूह

Root Words: OE prȳde = excellence, arrogance

question: What does Punctilious mean?
solution:
Punctilious

Punctilious = Extremely attentive to detail.

Hindi Meaning: कर्तव्यों का पालन करने में सावधानी

Root Words: Lat. punctum = point, detail

question: What does Quixotic mean?
solution:
Quixotic

Quixotic = Unrealistically idealistic.

Hindi Meaning: एक व्यक्ति जो जीवन के प्रति अवास्तविक रूप से आशावादी दृष्टिकोण रखता है

Root Words: From Don Quixote → impractically idealistic

question: What does Resilient mean?
solution:
Resilient

Resilient = Able to bounce back from hardship.

Hindi Meaning: अनेक कठिनाइयों के बावजूद एक मजबूत व्यक्ति बनना

Root Words: Lat. resilire = to spring back

question: What does Rigid mean?
solution:
Rigid

Rigid = Not flexible or adaptable.

Hindi Meaning: जिसकी राय और विश्वास निश्चित हो / जिसे मोड़ना कठिन हो

Root Words: Lat. rigidus = stiff

question: Who is a Sceptic?
solution:
Sceptic

Sceptic = Someone who doubts accepted beliefs.

Hindi Meaning: कोई व्यक्ति जो आदतन स्वीकृत मान्यताओं पर संदेह करता है

Root Words: Gr. skeptikos = one who inquires

question: What does Sedulous mean?
solution:
Sedulous

Sedulous = Showing persistence and dedication.

Hindi Meaning: देखभाल और लगातार प्रयास से चिह्नित

Root Words: Lat. sedulus = diligent

question: What does Shrewd mean?
solution:
Shrewd

Shrewd = Sharp and clever in practical matters.

Hindi Meaning: निर्णय लेने की कुशाग्र शक्ति दिखाना; चतुर और विवेकपूर्ण

Root Words: ME shrewed = wicked → clever

question: What does Spontaneous mean?
solution:
Spontaneous

Spontaneous = Done suddenly or naturally.

Hindi Meaning: अचानक आवेग के परिणामस्वरूप किया गया या घटित हुआ

Root Words: Lat. sponte = of one's own accord

question: What does Strict mean?
solution:
Strict

Strict = Demanding close adherence to rules.

Hindi Meaning: सैन्य वर्ग द्वारा संचालित सरकार जो किसी भी अनुचित बात के प्रति अरुचि प्रदर्शित करती है

Root Words: Lat. stringere = to bind tight

question: What does Subtle mean?
solution:
Subtle

Subtle = Delicate or difficult to detect.

Hindi Meaning: इतना नाजुक या सटीक कि उसका विश्लेषण या वर्णन करना कठिन हो

Root Words: Lat. subtilis = fine, delicate

question: What does Superficial mean?
solution:
Superficial

Superficial = Shallow; concerned with surface appearances.

Hindi Meaning: केवल किसी चीज़ की सतह पर

Root Words: Lat. superficies = surface

question: Who is a Termagant?
solution:
Termagant

Termagant = A harsh-tempered or overbearing woman.

Hindi Meaning: झगड़ालू

Root Words: ME = overbearing woman (orig. a mythical deity)

question: What does Thorough mean?
solution:
Thorough

Thorough = Done with great attention to detail.

Hindi Meaning: हर विवरण के संबंध में पूर्ण

Root Words: OE thurh = through, complete

question: What does Timid mean?
solution:
Timid

Timid = Showing a lack of courage or confidence.

Hindi Meaning: साहस या आत्मविश्वास की कमी दर्शाना

Root Words: Lat. timidus = fearful

question: What does Trivial mean?
solution:
Trivial

Trivial = Of little value or importance.

Hindi Meaning: महत्वपूर्ण या गंभीर नहीं / विचार करने लायक नहीं / स्पष्ट और नीरस

Root Words: Lat. trivialis = common, at a crossroads

question: What does Truculent mean?
solution:
Truculent

Truculent = Eager to fight or hostile in manner.

Hindi Meaning: निडरता से आक्रामक

Root Words: Lat. trux = fierce

question: What does Uxorious mean?
solution:
Uxorious

Uxorious = Excessively affectionate or submissive to one's wife.

Hindi Meaning: अपनी पत्नी से अत्यधिक प्रेम करने वाला

Root Words: Lat. uxor = wife (excessively fond of wife)

question: What does Vain mean?
solution:
Vain

Vain = Having an excessively high opinion of one’s appearance or abilities.

Hindi Meaning: किसी के रूप, योग्यता या मूल्य के बारे में अत्यधिक उच्च राय रखना या दिखाना

Root Words: Lat. vanus = empty, boastful

question: What does Versatile mean?
solution:
Versatile

Versatile = Able to do many things well; adaptable.

Hindi Meaning: किसी व्यक्ति के पास अनेक कौशल हों

Root Words: Lat. versatilis = turning easily

question: What is a Visionary?
solution:
Visionary

Visionary = One with foresight and original imagination.

Hindi Meaning: जो कल्पना और बुद्धि से भविष्य के बारे में सोच सकता है

Root Words: Lat. visio = vision

question: What does Vivacious mean?
solution:
Vivacious

Vivacious = Lively and animated.

Hindi Meaning: जीवंत, आकर्षक व्यक्तित्व होना

Root Words: Lat. vivax = lively

question: What does Willfully mean?
solution:
Willfully

Willfully = Done deliberately.

Hindi Meaning: जानबूझकर किया गया कार्य, यद्यपि करने वाला व्यक्ति जानता है कि यह गलत है

Root Words: With deliberate intention
